Comment.Language: For the Fast of the Apostles:

Text.Language: Nenio] eyouab n~a~poctoloc: n~yof eter[aumwit qajwou: sa n~toutacyo n~]oikoumen/: e~qoun e~p~couen ]meym/i.
Our holy apostolic fathers the Apostles - He guided them, until they returned the world to the knowledge of the Truth.
